name: nnash
description: Simple and fast NodeJS internal caching. Controllable through streams and events.
author: Robert Jefe Lindstaedt <robert.lindstaedt@gmail.com>

scripts.doc: jsdoc2md lib/platform_tools.js > doc/API.md && node -e "const fs = require('fs');fs.writeFile('README.md', fs.readFileSync('doc/README.md'));['doc/README.md', 'doc/API.md', 'doc/LICENSE.md'].forEach(function(el){fs.appendFileSync('README.md',fs.readFileSync(el))})"
scripts.postversion: TAG=$(echo $(git describe --tags $(git rev-list --tags --max-count=1))) && git tag -a $TAG $TAG -f -m "$(git log `git describe --tags --abbrev=0 HEAD^`..HEAD --oneline)" && git push && git push --tags
